title: Pixel 4xl is not charging
content: Pixel 4 xl is not charging. I have tried with different charger but still, it's not charging and turned off. Trying to switch on but it's not working. Please let us know how to fix this issue and we have a warranty. Please let me know about the authorised service centre in Bangalore, India.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
